WRITING.TITLE: titanfall is one of the best fps singleplayer campaigns since the early halo's imo
WRITING.TEXT: This games single player campaign was way better than any expectation i could have possibly had, the way they implement all of the different aspects and features of the game into the campaign instead of it just being, room full of enemies to kill rinse repeat, really helps that the character development between bt and jack seemed really plausible and realistic, 9/10 imo
